review_text: Non-descript entrance leading to perhaps the best quiet ambience and ambience and an excellent selection of scotch and whisky.

Hidden House is difficult to find without someone showing you how to get there,from the main street enter through a small arch way.Remember there is no signs.Then the first wooden door you see on the right is the entrance.Enter through the door you will then see another door that needs to be entered before you get into the bar. Hidden House is an appropriate name because this place is really well hidden. We visited here with a local and would almost certainly not have found it otherwise. Atmosphere was great but the selection of Whiskey's and the experienced bartenders are why I'll be returning. It is also the only place in China I've found with Tito's Vodka.
